title: Leveraged Growth Stock Strategy

issues.title: No risk disclosure section
issues.description: Strategy uses leverage and concentration but completely lacks risk disclosures required for investor documents
issues.suggested_fix: Add comprehensive Risk Disclosure section covering: leverage risks, concentration risk, sector risk, volatility risk, liquidity risk, regulatory risks

issues.title: Leverage risks not disclosed
issues.description: Uses 1.5x leverage but doesn't disclose amplified downside risks, margin calls, forced liquidation
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Leverage Risk: 1.5x leverage amplifies both gains and losses. A 10% decline in underlying assets results in 15% portfolio loss. Margin calls may force liquidation at unfavorable prices.'

issues.title: Concentration risk not disclosed
issues.description: Uses 'concentrated positions' but doesn't warn of concentration risk
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Concentration Risk: Top 20 holdings represent majority of portfolio. Poor performance of single holding can significantly impact returns.'

issues.title: Sector concentration risk not disclosed
issues.description: 100% allocation to tech and biotech but no disclosure of sector concentration risk
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Sector Concentration Risk: Portfolio concentrated in technology and biotechnology sectors. Sector downturns will significantly impact performance.'

issues.title: No discussion of potential losses or maximum drawdown
issues.description: Shows performance targets but no disclosure of downside potential or historical drawdowns
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Performance Risk: While targeting 25-30% annual returns, strategy may experience significant volatility. Historical maximum drawdown of 45% during 2022. Past performance does not predict future results.'

compliance_assessment.reason: Missing required risk disclosures for leveraged strategy

notes: Technically implementable but non-compliant for investor use without risk disclosures
